amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt settlements in relation to conduct involving residential mortgage-backed securities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 115-363 to exempt settlements in relation to the predatory or fraudulent conduct involving residential mortgage-backed securities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 231 (Roll no. 578).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 231 (Roll no. 578).
